name: Cube_X Adventure
description:
Cube_X Adventure is a short platformer in which you control a cube navigating a mysterious world to reach the Golden Eye an object that grants the wielder wishes...

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move and the left mouse button to jump you can perform up to 4 jumps.

Please bear in mind I have only really been working on this game for 2 weeks so it should be considered as an early prototype.

This game must be completed in one sitting for it does not contain a saving feature yet.

I may revisit this project some time in the future...
